Line.MultilineString: "To help you on your adventures you can pick up equipment. This will improve your statistics, such as health, power gain, match damage or ability damage. Equipment will also give you skills to use."
"Each skill takes a certain amount of power to use. You can find your skills in the 4 slots above the grid."
"Now here, take this sword and equip it."
"Okay now use it to destroy the training dummies. Match orb normally to gain power, then use the power by tapping the skill, then tapping your target, then tapping the button under your skill."
"Come back tomorrow and try again. Remember to use your skills."
"Well done. You will find all sorts of equipment in your adventures. Experiment and find which ones suit you best!"
